name: xss
description: Sanitize untrusted HTML (to prevent XSS) with a configuration specified by a Whitelist

scripts.test-cov: export DEBUG=xss:* && istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -t 5000 -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
